column1: share online condolences at www. fitzgeraldfh. com to send flowers or a remembrance gift to the family of marlene ann colloton please visit our tribute store. upcoming events15. jun. monday funeral service10:00 am st. edward catholic church3004 11th st., rockford, il 61109, united states visitation sunday, june 14, 2015, at fitzgerald funeral home and crematory from 5:00 pm until 7p. m. with a rosary recited at 7:00 pm get directions: text email google maps send flowers: order now and have it delivered before marlene's funeral service & gifts to the colloton family
